korean: 노트북이 갑자기 고장 나서 수리비를 내야 했다.
이럴 때를 대비해서 비상금이 정말 필요하다는 걸 느꼈다.
english: My laptop suddenly broke down, so I had to pay for repairs.
It was an expense not in the budget, so I was flustered.
I had no choice but to use my emergency fund.
I realized that an emergency fund is really necessary for times like this.
